Detailed Description

Macros, structures defining the IPDR protocol.

Note:

Not an error for re-sending a DSN this much older than the expected DSN

Function Documentation

enum IPDR_compareDSN_t compareDSN (  IPDR_DSN_TYPE  d1,
IPDR_DSN_TYPE  d2
) 
 

Compare two DSNs, taking into account wrap-around

Parameters:
d1 the first DSN
d2 the second DSN
Returns:
'>', '=', '<', '?' for d1 > d2, d1 == d2, d1 < d2, not comparable 
00053 {
00054     enum IPDR_compareDSN_t result = IPDR_compareDSN_unknown;
00055 
00056 #if 1
00057     /* unsigned arithmetic */
00058 
00059     if (d1 == d2) {
00060         result = IPDR_compareDSN_equal;
00061     } else {
00062         IPDR_DSN_TYPE diff1 = d1 - d2;
00063         IPDR_DSN_TYPE diff2 = d2 - d1;
00064         IPDR_DSN_TYPE diff = (diff1 <= diff2) ? diff1 : diff2;
00065         if (diff <= IPDR_VALID_DSN_WINDOW) {
00066             if ((d1 + diff) == d2) {
00067                 result = IPDR_compareDSN_less;
00068             } else if ((d2 + diff) == d1) {
00069                 result = IPDR_compareDSN_greater;
00070             } /* else: shouldn't happen */
00071         }
00072     }
00073 #else
00074     /* signed arithmetic */
00075     if (d1 == d2) {
00076         result = IPDR_compareDSN_equal;
00077     } else if (abs(d1 - d2) <= IPDR_VALID_DSN_WINDOW) {
00078         result = (d1 > d2) ? IPDR_compareDSN_greater : IPDR_compareDSN_less;
00079     } else if ((IPDR_MAX_DSN - d2) + (d1 - IPDR_INITIAL_DSN) <= IPDR_VALID_DSN_WINDOW) {
00080         result = (d2 > d1) ? IPDR_compareDSN_greater : IPDR_compareDSN_less;
00081     } else if ((IPDR_MAX_DSN - d1) + (d2 - IPDR_INITIAL_DSN) <= IPDR_VALID_DSN_WINDOW) {
00082         result = (d2 > d1) ? IPDR_compareDSN_greater : IPDR_compareDSN_less;
00083     }
00084 #endif
00085 
00086     return result;
00087 }
